title: Riot has time to make this but not TRIBUNAL
body:
GG!

Yeh Yeh, It's "coming" right!

Been 1.5 yrs nerds!

replies.body: different teams work on different things, dumbass.

> different teams work on different things, dumbass.

This.
Poor excuse, it's still invested money.
I would like a tribunal, as cool as this is people would notice a tribunal a lot more I think, boards wont ban toxic players in your teams {{champion:27}}
